name: INKED: Escape
description:
INKED: ESCAPE

Raised in her close-knit religious nation, she and her best friend, H, the daughter of the ruling Archbishop, have been training to join the Holy Army their entire lives. The eve of her 18th birthday, she excitedly prepares for the ceremony that will grant her weapon and allow her to finally begin her service. But when things start going wrong, it becomes clear fate has a different plan. With her life at stake, she must escape-- with or without H.
